title: The Princess is Evil - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Assassins   Beautiful Female Lead   Child Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Depictions of Cruelty   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Dragons   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Flashbacks   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Necromancer   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Royalty   Strong to Stronger   Tragic Past   Witches
author: Cha Sohee   Ggomi   차소희
description:
I was a witch whose age was over 300 years old, but I was betrayed and killed by the one man I believed in. After I was reborn into a vicious imperial family, I decided to become an empress to get my revenge. So, as a witch, I acted evilly and thought that everyone would be afraid of me but…

“I picked this for you. You can eat it or throw it away.”

“Can’t you just touch my head once? If I said that you stroked my head, everyone would be envious.”

Come on. Isn’t this the imperial family where everyone kills each other? So it’s natural that you should try to kill me, right?

“Do it more. Because it’s cute.”
>
